[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-120px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646727910509{margin-bottom: -55px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”33986″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658394649898{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

India’s First and Only 360°

Kids Skill Development Training Program by Digiperform
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

A Training program that prepares your kid to be a Future leader

[vc_single_image image=”33807″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658394563166{margin-bottom: -1px !important;}”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646653181875{padding-top: 120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
First-of-a-Kind Course for Young Indian Generation
Why Choose Digiperform Digital Ninja Program?
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

INDIA’S 1ST & ONLY

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646308449675{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Training Covering all 3 leadership skills i.e. Coding, Digital, Entrepreneurship

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

MICRO BATCHES

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646308515772{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Only 6-8 Students working in teams competing against each other

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

LEADING BRAND

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646308542075{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Digiperform is India’s Leading brand in Digital education backed by HindustanTimes

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]

SECURE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646308559929{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Complete privacy & protection of your child data, Faculty trained in Children handling

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1646309065788{margin-top: -80px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-160px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1645781187321{margin-top: 180px !important;}”][vc_column]

“Future Skills” Training for Kids
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646309024297{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • A Training program that prepares your kid to be a Future leader
  • Skills Inspired by life journeys of 1000+ Top CEO’s & Entrepreneurs
  • This is a First-of-a-Kind Course for Young Indian Generation
  • For Age Group: 8-16
  • Duration: 1-6 Months
  • 3 Levels: White, Orange & Black Belt
  • All in one program:  Coding + Digital + Entrepreneurship Skills
  • Must have skills in World Post Covid-19

[/vc_column_text]

Start with a Free Demo
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646310142831{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33829″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33830″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33831″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645779624966{padding-top: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1645788953533{padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column]
Digi Ninja Program Packages

Your kids will learn skills like Research, Data Analysis, and Project management to ensure they never get stuck and dependent on anyone in their lifetime.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1590184775990{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1559098453441{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]
Duration: 12 Classes

White Belt -Beginner

Fee: ₹ 6000

Image Editing
Graphic & Banner Designing
Ebook Creation
Video Animation & Editing
Code Logic & Decision Making
Solving Puzzles And Building Stories
HTML Page Designing
Advanced Google Search
Image Editing & Logo Creation
Vcard, Letter Head & Banner Designing
Video Shoot & Editing
SKILLS LEARNED: Research & Project Launch Creativity & Visualization
Visibility & Presentation
Logic & Decision Making
ACHIEVEMENTS: Graphic Designer, Animator And Coder
Start with Free Demo
Duration: 36 Classes

Orange Belt -Pro

Fee: ₹ 18000

ALL WHITE BELT SKILLS+
Internet Safety & Security
Mastering Google Suite
Web Surveys & Research
Blog Creation
Web Content Writing
Website Creation
Youtube Marketing
Mobile App & Game Creation
ACTIVITIES: Safe Downloads & E-Shopping, Web Surveys Blog Writing & Setup
Professional Website Creation
Youtube Channel Creation
Youtube Channel Creation
Commercial Mobile App & Game Designing
SKILLS LEARNED: Management Marketing & Communication, Programming Application Development
ACHIEVEMENTS: Digital Media Expert, Content Writer, Website & App Developer
Start with Free Demo
Duration: 72 Classes

Black Belt- Advanced Pro

Fee: ₹ 36000

ALL ORANGE BELT SKILLS+
Email Marketing
Social Media Marketing
Corporate Presentation
Web Analytics
Online Business Planning
Online Advertising
Online Freelancing & Live Projects
ACTIVITIES: Designing & Sending Emails, Planning a Project From Scratch
Creating Presentation For a Future
Business Setting up Social Media Business Presence & Start Advertising
Building Profiles To sell your services online
SKILLS LEARNED: Data Analysis Project Management & Delivery Skill Monetization, Sales And Freelancing
ACHIEVEMENTS Full Stack Digital Entrepreneur
Start with Free Demo
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
